column2: "Dzin pa ye dɛ wɔsan mu yi sen ahonya kɛse
column3: Na enyimpa ye sen dwetɛ na sika."

column2: "Adze kor bi yɛ dansewa wɔ obirɛmpɔn na ɔkɔhweaban ho: EWURADZE nye hɔn nyina hɔn yɛfo."
"Ɔbadwembanyi hu mbusu
column3: na ɔdze noho suma: Na adwenharnyi dze
column4: ɔnam n’enyim araa kɔtɔ mbusu no mu."

column2: "Ahobrɛadze n’akatua na EWURADZE ho suro Nye ahonya
column3: enyidzi

column2: "Nsoɛ na mfir wɔ kɔntɔnkyenyi no no kwan do: Nyia osie ne kra no dze
column3: ɔnye hɔn ntamu bɔtwe."

column2: "Tsetse abofra wɔ ɔkwan a ɔsɛ dɛ ɔfa do no do
column3: Na sɛ onyin mpo a

column2: "Obirɛmpɔn dzi ɔkɔhweaban do tum
column3: Na ɔdzefirfo yɛ akowaa ma ɔdzefɛmfo."

column2: "Nyia odua emumuyɛ no obubu mbusu Na n’ebufuw abaa no behi."
"Nyia ɔwɔ ayamuyie enyiwa no
column3: wobehyira no; Osiandɛ ɔdze n’edziban bi ma ehiafo."

column2: "Yi ɔtwetwesinyi no edzi
column3: na aperper befi hɔ akɔ; Nyew

column2: "Nyia ɔdɔ akoma mu krɔnkrɔnyɛ no
column3: N’ano kasa yɛ dɛw ntsi

column2: "EWURADZE n’enyiwa kora nyia ɔwɔ nyimdzee
column3: Na nkontompɔtwanyi ne nsɛm dze

column2: "Ɔkwadwefo dɛ
column3: Ogyata wɔ abowano: Wobedzi me ewu wɔ abrɔn do."

column2: "Mbaa asansafo ano yɛ mona dɔnkuronn: Nyia EWURADZE no werɛ apow no no
column3: ɔkɔhwe mu."

column2: "Nkwaseadze wɔ abofra n’akoma mu; Na ntsea abaa na obotu ase koraa efi no mu."
"Nyia ɔhaw ɔbɔbɔfo dze dɔr ne mfaso no
column3: Na nyia ɔdze ma ɔhonyanyi no

column2: "Kyɛn w’aso
column3: na tsie enyansafo nsɛm
column4: Na fa w’akoma ma me nyimdzee."

column2: "Na ɔyɛ adze a oye dɛ edze besie wo mu
column3: Dɛ wɔdze ne nyina bɔbɔ mu afam w’ano."

column2: "Mbrɛ ɔbɛyɛ ma edze wo werɛ bɛhyɛ EWURADZE mu no
column3: Makyerɛ wo ndɛ da yi

column2: "Ana mennkyerɛɛw wo nsɛm eduasa a odzi mu Wɔ apam na nyimdzee ho;"
"Ama eehu nokwasɛm no nokwar a ɔyɛ
column3: Ama edze nokwasɛm aasan akɛma hɔn a wɔsoma wo?"

column2: "Mma nnwia ɔbɔbɔfo
column3: osiandɛ ɔyɛ ɔbɔbɔfo ntsi
column4: Eso mma nntseetsee amandzehunyi wɔ kuropon mu:"

column2: "Na EWURADZE bedzi hɔn asɛm ama hɔn
column3: Na hɔn a wɔfa hɔn afo no

column2: "Mma mmfa nyimpa a ɔyɛ ebufuw ebufuw no nyɛnko; Na mma nnye nyimpa a ɔwɔ ebufuhyew no nnkɔ:"
"Amma eennsua n’akwan
column3: Na eennsua efir amma wo kra."

column2: "Mma nnyɛ hɔn a wodzi egyinamu ma binom no mu bi Anaa hɔn a wodzi akagyinamu mu baako:"
"Sɛ innyi dza edze botua a
column3: Wo mpa a eda do mpo

column2: "Mma nnyi tsetse ɔhe a W’egyanom dze esi hɔ no mmfi hɔ."
"Ana ehu obi a ɔyɛ nsi wɔ n’edwuma mu a? Obegyina ahemfo enyim. Na onnkegyina mpapahwekwa enyim da."
